org.transitime.ipc.data

Class IpcVehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.ipc.data.IpcVehicle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IpcExtVehicle

    @Immutable
public class IpcVehicle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains information on a single vehicle. For providing info to client. This class is Immutable so that it is threadsafe.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getHeading

        public float getHeading()
        Returns number of degrees clockwise from due North. Note that this is very different from angle(). The path heading that the vehicle matched to is used when it is available. When path heading not available then uses the AVL heading. That can be NaN as well though.
        Returns:
        Heading of vehicle, or null if speed not defined.

      • getSpeed

        public float getSpeed()
        Returns:
        Speed of vehicle, or null if speed not defined.
